title: Hero MotoCorp commences Harley-Davidson X440 bookings; deliveries to begin in October
description: The motorcycle is available in three variants - Denim, Vivid and S at an introductory price point of Rs 2.29 lakh, Rs 2.49 lakh and Rs 2.69 lakh (ex-showroom), respectively. The Harley-Davidson X440 marks Hero MotoCorp and Harley-Davidson's foray into the 440cc segment for the first time in India.
